Package ie.gmit.sw

Class Cipher

java.lang.Object
ie.gmit.sw.Cipher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cipherable
public class Cipher extends Object implements Cipherable

Instance of this class is used to create maps/lists based on ciphertext entered by a user

Implements methods declared in the interface, Cipherable

17.0.1
